channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI Helps Fuel New Wave Of Creative Destruction

item.title: The Rise Of The AI Nation
item.description: The traditional nation-state is a construct of the 18th century, weaponized in the 20th. But in the age of distributed intelligence, it may make way f...

item.title: Building The Future Of Smarter Security Operations
item.description: Security teams face burnout, tool sprawl, and alert fatigue. Discover how AI, detection as code, and platform unification are reshaping the modern SOC...

item.title: Brain-Inspired AI Chip Enables Energy-Efficient Off-Grid Processing
item.description: Designed by Professor Hussam Amrouch, this brain-inspired chip performs on-device computations, enhancing cybersecurity and energy efficiency.

item.title: Google To Expose Deepfakes With New AI Detector Portal
item.description: Google's SynthID portal helps you detect AI-generated content. Discover how this tool works & its limitations in the fight against deepfakes.

item.title: Getting to next

item.title: How many more in the bag?
